row1.title: Understanding zk-SNARKs and zk-STARKs: A Developerâ€™s Perspective
row1.desc: Zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs) are a cornerstone of modern cryptography, enabling one party to prove knowledge of specific information without revealing the information itself. zk-SNARKs and zk-STARKs are tools for achieving privacy and scalability in blockchain and other systems.
